text: Ylena In-Albon (born 6 March 1999) is a Swiss tennis player. On 20 May 2019, she achieved a career-high singles ranking of world No. 175. On 3 February 2020, she peaked at No. 225 in the doubles rankings. In-Albon made her main- draw debut on the WTA Tour at the 2017 Ladies Open Biel Bienne in the doubles draw, partnering compatriot player Leonie Küng. ==ITF Circuit finals== ===Singles: 8 (6 titles, 2 runner–ups)=== {| |- valign=top | {| class="wikitable" |- !
